lead_paragraph: Asylum seekers being held on Nauru are denied adequate medical care and exposed to crime, and depression and anxiety are rampant, a report said.

headline.print_headline: Australia Accused of Allowing Abuse to Deter Refugees
headline.main: Australia Allows Abuse of Refugees to Deter Others, Rights Groups Say

snippet: Asylum seekers being held on Nauru are denied adequate medical care and exposed to crime, and depression and anxiety are rampant, a report said....
abstract: Amnesty International and Human Rights Watch issue joint report that reveals asylum seekers and refugees held on Nauru are having suffering inflicted deliberately upon them by companies paid by Australian government.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
